title: Butterfly and Hellflower
description: Contents: Hellflower -- Darktraders -- Archangel blues.The Hellflower series features Butterfly St Cyr, a female starpilot trying to make a living as a tramp cargo hauler, as she befriends Valijon Starbringer (or, as Butterfly calls him, "Tiggy Stardust") a teenage hellflower (slang for a mercenary) who is totally out of his depth.
author: Eluki bes Shahar
